attributes.action: Periodically publish on this website or elsewhere a statistical analysis of responses to petitions showing numbers of positive (action being taken), negative (defending existing position) or neutral (kept under consideration etc) responses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public are entitled to see the extent to which e-Petitions is a way of being heard to effect, as opposed to merely being a means of "letting off steam" and for the Government to defend its existing position.
